data.title: ASOHF: Adaptive Spherical Overdensity Halo Finder
data.name: ASOHF
data.description: Adaptive Spherical Overdensity Halo Finder (Planelles & Quilis, 2010. A&A, 519:A94; Vallés-Pérez, Planelles & Quilis, 2022. A&A in press)

evidence: "Adaptive Spherical Overdensity Halo Finder" – described as a specific scientific code/tool rather than a reusable library, indicating an application used to find halos in simulations.
The README links to scientific papers (Planelles & Quilis 2010; Vallés-Pérez et al. 2022), implying the code is directly used to produce astrophysical research results.
The repository presents the code name and documentation link only, with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying distribution via the source repository and its documentation site.
